dismissalText.commentary: Adrian Barath c Kapugedera b Malinga 113 (129b 8x4 2x6 186m) SR: 87.59

dismissalComment.html: Malinga gets another wicket, this time of the in-form Barath. They are losing wickets in the batting powerplay. Barath too goes the similar way to Sarwan, hits it down the ground to long on and Kapugedera once again takes the catch.

headshotImage.longCaption: Chamara Kapugedera player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalText.commentary: Ramnaresh Sarwan c Kapugedera b Malinga 75 (100b 4x4 1x6 122m) SR: 75

dismissalComment.html: as expected a wicket goes down, hits it over mid-on, goes high in the air and Kapugedera judges it well and takes the catch. A good knock from Sarwan comes to an end.

dismissalComment.html: Malinga gets another wicket, this time of the in-form Barath. They are losing wickets in the batting powerplay. Barath too goes the similar way to Sarwan, hits it down the ground to long on and Kapugedera once again takes the catch.

headshotImage.caption: Kieron Pollard player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Kieron Pollard player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: bowled !  and wicket explodes, Pollard goes for a single digit figure. Slow in-swinger and Pollard does not pick it up, the ball knocks the leg stump, he played all over it.

headshotImage.longCaption: Muttiah Muralitharan player page headshot cutout, 2021

dismissalComment.html: a chance for run out and third umpire is called into action for the first time today. Barath pushes to the onside, Bravo is half way down, stops in his tracks and he then turns and looks to get back into the crease, Kapugedera fields the ball and throws to Murali, who gets rid of the bails. There was no run there.

headshotImage.longCaption: Ramnaresh Sarwan player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: driven to extra cover for a single and that ends the West Indian innings.

commentPostTextItems.html: Innings Break: West Indies finish on 245, well below the score they were aiming to get or when Barath and Sarwan were batting. It was the batting powerplay that destroyed the Windies batting, they lost wickets in succession. SSC is very dark at the moment, showers are expected and Messrs Duckworth and Lewis will be called into play. Join us after the lunch break at 1:45pm.

headshotImage.caption: Shivnarine Chanderpaul player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shivnarine Chanderpaul player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: DJG Sammy headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: DJG Sammy headshot

headshotImage.caption: KMDN Kulasekara headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: KMDN Kulasekara headshot

commentTextItems.html: low full toss and played straight to midwicket. Wonderful final over from Kulasekara.
backs away and works to midwicket, well fielded by Mathews.
short ball pulled to deep backward square leg.

commentPreTextItems.html: Kulasekara to bowl the final over.

commentTextItems.html: driven to midwicket for a single.

headshotImage.caption: DJG Sammy headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: DJG Sammy headshot

headshotImage.caption: Shivnarine Chanderpaul player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shivnarine Chanderpaul player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Ajantha Mendis player page headshot cutout, 2021

commentTextItems.html: looking to reverse sweep, hits him on the arm guard.
flicks it to deep square leg and picks up couple of runs.
pushes to the onside for a single.
driven down the ground to long off for a single.

headshotImage.caption: Shivnarine Chanderpaul player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shivnarine Chanderpaul player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: DJG Sammy headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: DJG Sammy headshot

headshotImage.caption: SL Malinga headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: SL Malinga headshot

commentTextItems.html: pushes to the onside for another single.

commentPostTextItems.html: Viresh: "Dont worry Vik, you will see Pollard explode against India in the world cup.  So tune in then & you won't be disappointed."

commentTextItems.html: another slower one from Malinga, this is excellent bowling.
chips it over mid-on for a single.
nice slower ball from Malinga and Sammy is hit on the box and he looks to be hurt.

commentPostTextItems.html: The physio is out to look at Sammy.

commentPreTextItems.html: Pretty overcast conditions at SSC, it is very dark at the moment. Will D/L come into play in the second innings to make it very interesting?

commentTextItems.html: wonderful strike from Sammy, low full toss and Sammy puts it away in style, flicks it all the way over the square leg fence for a six.

headshotImage.caption: DJG Sammy headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: DJG Sammy headshot

headshotImage.caption: Shivnarine Chanderpaul player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Shivnarine Chanderpaul player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: KMDN Kulasekara headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: KMDN Kulasekara headshot

commentTextItems.html: pushes down the ground for a quick single.

commentPreTextItems.html: 3:20pm: The match has been officially called off. Thanks to Manoj Ridimahaliyadda and Chaminda de Silva, this is Binoy George signing off, do join us again on February 3rd for the 2nd ODI.

3:15pm: The umpires have gone to the players dressing room, lot to think about, the match might be called off pretty soon. The cut off time is 4:10 pm and they need to take a decision by 3:25pm, as I type this it has started to rain heavily once again.
3:00pm: It has started to drizzle once again and the story continues....
2:50pm: The rain has stopped but there is lot of water on the covers. Play not expected to start soon.
2:30pm: If you did not know, it is still pelting down, the groundsmen have covered the whole ground.

Prabhash Salinda: "We, Sri Lankans have never experienced rainy weather in February. This is a classic example of relationship between WI and rain. When ever we face a drought we can arrange a WI tour. We are lucky to have WI in the other group of World Cup......"
2:10pm: It is dark all around the stadium and it is pelting down. Play looks bleak.
Raj Arora: "I guess West Indies - Sri Lanka-rain have some serious relationship..a love triangle." That is a good one.
1:55pm: The rain is getting heavier and it looks very bad.
1:45pm: Welcome back, we have some bad news, it has started to drizzle and the whole ground is covered. Play is not expected to start for an hour at least.

dismissalText.commentary: Adrian Barath c Kapugedera b Malinga 113 (129b 8x4 2x6 186m) SR: 87.59

dismissalComment.html: Malinga gets another wicket, this time of the in-form Barath. They are losing wickets in the batting powerplay. Barath too goes the similar way to Sarwan, hits it down the ground to long on and Kapugedera once again takes the catch.

headshotImage.caption: Kieron Pollard player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Kieron Pollard player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: Kieron Pollard player page headshot cutout, 2021
headshotImage.longCaption: Kieron Pollard player page headshot cutout, 2021

headshotImage.caption: SL Malinga headshot
headshotImage.longCaption: SL Malinga headshot

dismissalComment.html: bowled !  and wicket explodes, Pollard goes for a single digit figure. Slow in-swinger and Pollard does not pick it up, the ball knocks the leg stump, he played all over it.

notes: AB Barath 50 runs in 70 balls, 101 mts (4 x 4)
RR Sarwan 50 runs in 67 balls, 85 mts (1 x 4, 1 x 6)
AB Barath 100 runs in 119 balls, 163 mts (7 x 4, 2 x 6)
